metadata.title: CVE-2017-13710 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The setup_group function in elf.c in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.29, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and application crash) via a group section that is too small.

notes.note: sbeattie> commit for 2.29 is part of a larger backport

criterions.comment: binutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.29.1-1ubuntu1').
